code: @Test public void testOneRouteRefNoOnException() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:handled").expectedMessageCount(0).     try {         template.sendBody("direct:foo", "Hello World").         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (CamelExecutionException e) {         assertIsInstanceOf(IllegalArgumentException.class, e.getCause()).         assertEquals("Damn", e.getCause().getMessage()).     }     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Test public void testOneRouteRefOnException() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:bar").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:handled").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:bar", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
